Release v0.3.0-alpha: Radio button support and GitHub Actions automation

This release adds radio button field type support to the dynamic form system
and implements automated build/release workflow via GitHub Actions.

## Features Added
- Radio button support in dynamic forms
  - New CustomRadioGroup widget with RadioListTile UI
  - Support for question_type: "radio" in DynamicFormBuilder
  - Full validation support (required field)
  - Consistent styling with bordered container

- GitHub Actions automation
  - Auto-build debug APK on push to main
  - Auto-create GitHub Release with version tagging
  - Upload APK to release (mbg-flutter-{version}-debug.apk)
  - 90-day artifact retention

## Technical Changes
- Dynamic form now supports 8 field types: text, number, textarea,
  dropdown, radio, date, map, image
- Updated version to 0.3.0-alpha+20251008
- Updated CHANGELOG.md and CLAUDE.md documentation
